      The Smallest ⌜Wireless⌟ Potentiostat

      This is a wireless potentiostat which is beyond all imagination! The Smallest ⌜Wireless⌟Potentiostat -ECWP100single Finger-size and wireless connect, plug and play. It can be expanded to 8 Channels. Two port type for three electrodes systems or screen printed electrodes. If you are developing a detecting meter, the ECAS function will give you a completely new development experience with its simulator function.
